gurmukhi: ਦਰਸਨ ਜੋਤਿ ਕੋ ੳੁਦੋਤ ਸੁਖ ਸਾਗਰ ਮੈ ਕੋਟਿਕ ੳੁਸਤਤ ਛਬਿ ਤਿਲ ਕੋ ਪ੍ਰਗਾਸ ਹੈ
transliteration: Darasan Joti Ko Udot Soukh Saagar Mai , Kotik Ousatat Chhabi Til Ko Pragaas Hai ?
translation: The radiance of the light of the True Guru, the ocean of happiness and comfort is repository of all the happiness of the world. A glimmer of light no more than a sesame seed has generated radiance of millions of beauties and adulations in the world.

gurmukhi: ਕਿੰਚਤ ਕ੍ਰਿਪਾ ਕੋਟਿਕ ਕਮਲਾ ਕਲਪਤਰ ਮਧੁਰ ਬਚਨ ਮਧੁ ਕੋਟਿਕ ਬਿਲਾਸ ਹੈ
transliteration: Kinchat Kripaa Kotik Kamalaa Kalapatara , Madhur Bachan Madhu Kotik Bilaas Hai ?
translation: A little kind look of the True Guru has millions of goddesses of wealth and celestial trees capable of fulfilling all desires, hidden in it. Elixir immersed sweet words of the True Guru has millions of relishments of the world.

gurmukhi: ਮੰਦ ਮੁਸਕਾਨਿ ਬਾਨਿ ਖਾਨਿ ਹੈ ਕੋਟਾਨਿ ਸਸਿ ਸੋਭਾ ਕੋਟਿ ਲੋਟ ਪੋਟ ਕੁਮੁਦਨੀ ਤਾਸੁ ਹੈ
transliteration: Mand Mousakaani Baani Khaani Hai Kotaani Sasi , Sobhaa Koti Lot Pot Koumudanee Taasu Hai ?
translation: The habit of soft and slow smile of the True Guru is the source of praise of millions of moons. The glory of millions of nymphea flowers is sacrifice unto it.

gurmukhi: ਮਨ ਮਧੁਕਰ ਮਕਰੰਦ ਰਸ ਲੁਭਿਤ ਹੁੲਿ ਸਹਜ ਸਮਾਧਿ ਲਿਵ ਬਿਸਮ ਬਿਸ੍ਵਸ ਹੈ ॥੨੯੪॥
transliteration: Man Madhoukar Makarand Ras Loubhit Hui , Sahaj Samaadhi Liv Bisam Bisvas Hai ?294?
translation: A devoted and loving Sikh of the Guru enamoured by the elixir-like relishment of Naam Simran practiced through the teachings of the True Guru remains absorbed in a state of equipoise and astonishing devotion of the Lord. (294)
